Name: BOSS
Text: Let's see. Your score today was [wave]$SCORE[/wave].

Name: BOSS
Text: And for these two days you've been employed it's [wave]$TOTALSCORE[/wave] in total.

Name: BOSS
Text: Pretty good, although I know you can do better.

Name: BOSS
Text: I'll see what the guys over at development can do about that bugged tool of yours.

Name: BOSS
Text: Don't be late tomorrow. We start at 06:00, real sharp.
